summary: Diff implements a responsive header with a mobile hamburger (Sheet) menu and adjusts the app shell layout to prevent content/scroll issues under the header. Build success (REQ-3) cannot be confirmed from the provided diff summary alone.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the frontend build completes successfully after the layout changes (no TypeScript errors; no runtime console errors in header/navigation code paths when switching views).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows code changes but provides no build/test output or evidence of a successful production build or runtime verification.
